sessions.name: Breakfast and Registration
sessions.description: Attendees arrive and check-in. Breakfast is served, providing an opportunity for networking

sessions.name: Mining Expo Presentation
sessions.description: Welcome address by the event organizer. Introduction of keynote speakers and special guests. Overview of the day's events and activities.

sessions.name: Keynote Speeches
sessions.description: Prominent figures from the mining industry deliver informative and inspiring talks

sessions.name: Technical Presentations and Workshops
sessions.description: Parallel sessions with industry experts sharing insights on various mining-related topics. Attendees can choose which presentations or workshops to attend based on their interests.

sessions.name: Panel Discussions
sessions.description: Panels of experts discuss current challenges and trends in the mining industry. Audience Q&A session allows attendees to engage with panelists.

sessions.name: Panel Discussions
sessions.description: Panels of experts discuss current challenges and trends in the mining industry. Audience Q&A session allows attendees to engage with panelists.

sessions.name: Technical Presentations (Concurrent Sessions)
sessions.description: Session 1: Sustainable Mining Practices

sessions.name: Technical Presentations (Concurrent Sessions)
sessions.description: Session 2: Innovations in Mineral Exploration

sessions.name: Workshop - Safety Measures in Mining Operations
sessions.description: A workshop is conducted to educate attendees on safety protocols and best practices in mining

sessions.name: Presentation - Mining in the Digital Age
sessions.description: Experts present on how digital technologies are transforming the mining industry

sessions.name: Advances in Mining Technologies
sessions.description: The mining industry has witnessed significant advancements in technology

sessions.name: Lunch and Exhibition
sessions.description: Lunch is served. Participants explore the exhibition area to learn about the latest products and services in the mining sector

sessions.name: Technology Showcase
sessions.description: Companies demonstrate their cutting-edge mining technologies and solutions.

sessions.name: Panel Discussion - Environmental Responsibility in Mining
sessions.description: Experts discuss sustainable mining practices and minimizing the environmental impact

sessions.name: Panel Discussion: Mining in Developing Economies: Challenges and Opportunities
sessions.description: Experts discuss sustainable mining practices and minimizing the environmental impact

sessions.name: Push Notifications in Ionic
sessions.description: Mobile devices and browsers are now advanced enough that developers can build native-quality mobile apps using open web technologies like HTML5, Javascript, and CSS. In this talk, we’ll provide background on why and how we created Ionic, the design decisions made as we integrated Ionic with Angular, and the performance considerations for mobile platforms that our team had to overcome. We’ll also review new and upcoming Ionic features, and talk about the hidden powers and benefits of combining mobile app development and Angular.
